result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dionte Ledonis Churchwell

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
On State's motion, Court ordered case dismissed and read into case 22CM518.

Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dionte Ledonis Churchwell appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Defense is requesting Justice Point monitoring level be lowered due to defendant's job.  State does not object.  Court will allow justice point monitoring to be lowered to the defendant have to report to Justice Point once a month. All other previous bail conditions remain the same. Parties are still negotiating and requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 5-25-22 at 8:30 am for status conference, by zoom.  Status conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Defendant has a new case pending.  Case is adjourned to 4-29-22 at 8:30 am for status conference along with defendant's new case.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:

Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dionte Ledonis Churchwell appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
Case heard via Zoom. 
Defense counsel was just appointed.  Defense requests status conference date.  Court grants defense request. Case adjourned for Status Conference in branch 10.
  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.    This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for March 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Order Appointing Counsel

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with Tiaira B.J.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in court with attorney Gary Edward Rosenthal.  Defendant Dionte Ledonis Churchwell in custody.  Stephanie Krueger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dionte Ledonis Churchwell appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Defense request to be heard on bail at Pretrial.
This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
